verses.roman:
"bālya-kāle mātā mora nāsā chidra kari'
muktā parāñāchila bahu yatna kari'

synonyms: bālya-kāle—in My childhood; mātā—mother; mora—My; nāsā—nose; chidra kari'-making a hole; muktā—a pearl; parāñāchila—was put on it; bahu—much; yatna—endeavor; kari'-taking.
translation: "During My childhood My mother made a hole in My nose and with great endeavor set a pearl there.
